name: Vaulted Bellscoin
description: Vaulted Bellscoin is a non-custodial wrapped form of Bellscoin ($BELLS) bridged permissionlessly to the Ethereum network using the Televault protocol. Televault is a permissionless and trust-minimized cross-chain bridge that enables anyone to "teleport" fungible assets from UTXO-based blockchains (e.g. BTC, LTC, DOGE, BEL) to Ethereum by leveraging Emblem Vault, the leading protocol for cross-chain NFTs.
